name: Rumbling 20's Remake
description:
Hi everyone,

Rumbling 20's Remake is a finished version of my first game, an endless runner, in Unity for my first Global Game Jam. I'll leave all the links if you want to compare the versions both. The code is open source, so if you want you can check how I projected it. Do not worry, the code is commented enough! Feel free to ping me if you need help :)

  • Rumbling 20's Remake(Updated version):
    • - GitHub
  • Rumbling 20's(GGJ version):
    • - Global Game Jam 2020
    - GitHub
